reviewText: Good documentary showing the tough choices China faces in meeting the energy demands of their growing population.  Points out the fallacy of the justification that it will save many lives ia flood control when the reservoir will most likely be kept full to maximize power generation.

I enjoy seeing the things that are going on in the world and this is one of them.
This method of rental is not the best as I have a DVD with almost the same information in it that I purchased and have in my hands.
